Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Horemwia with a black lappet wig with coloured braids at the ends, a brown face, a large yellow, red and black collar surrounding the brown hands, the legs inscribed with a single central column of black hieroglyphs including the name of Osiris on a yellow background, the back and edges of the legs are white.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
